Section.name: About Amity University
Section.description:
Amity University Patna is a private university established 2017 by the Amity Education Group. It is located in Patna, Bihar, and is approved by UGC and BCI. The institute was granted World Record by the World Book of Records and is among the top universities in Bihar.
Amity Patna offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Doctoral courses in the fields of Commerce, Computer Science, Engineering, Management, Law, English Literature & Journalism. Admission to all these courses is either based on merit of the qualifying examination or Amity University Entrance Test. Patna Amity also provides excellent placement opportunities and the highest and average packages reported in 2024 are INR 30 LPA and INR 5 LPA respectively.
Amity University Patna has state-of-the-art infrastructure and facilities including 100 mbps WiFi at every corner, well-equipped computer labs, huge library with digital access, cctv camera coverage, audio-visual facility, AC classrooms, high-end conference hall, spacious seminar hall, printing facilities, and language lab with communication helpdesks. The institute also gives its students the opportunity to study abroad under its 5-week study abroad program in its global campuses located in London, New York, Dubai, Singapore, and Australia.

Ques. What is the difference between sponsored and non-sponsored Category?
Ans. Sponsored category applies to low merit category with high fees and non-sponsored is for high merit category. Changing the category depends on the Admission Committee.
Ques. Can a student apply for the UG/PG program in the absence of 10+2/Graduation final year result?
Ans. Yes, the student can apply provisionally for any course but all original mark sheets need to be submitted before the last submission date.
Ques. What are the selection criteria for Foreign & NRI/PIO/OCI candidates?
Ans. The requirements of subjects studied are same for both national and Foreign/NRI candidates
Ques. Does the institute provide scholarships?
Ans. Yes, Amity University Scholarships are offered for various UG and PG programs based on marks obtained by the candidates in the previous qualifying examination or entrance tests.
Ques. Do I need to pay any security deposit fee during admission?
Ans. Yes, you have to pay INR 20,000 as academic security deposit which is refundable at the end of the course.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna address?
Ans. Amity University Patna is located near Rupaspur Police Station, Rupaspur, Bailey Road, Patna, Bihar. The Pin Code is 801503.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna fee structure?
Ans. The Amity University Patna fee structure ranges between INR 50,000 to INR 1,00,000 per semester. It depends on the course you’ve enrolled in and the specialization chosen.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna BCA fee structure?
Ans. The Amity University Patna BCA fee structure is INR 54,000 for non-sponsored candidates and INR 81,000 for sponsored candidates. Whereas, the Amity University Patna fees for integrated BCA & MCA course is INR 49,000 for non-sponsored candidates and INR 73,500 for sponsored candidates.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna BBA fee structure?
Ans. The Amity University Patna BBA fee structure is INR 83,500 for non-sponsored candidates and INR 1,25,500 for sponsored candidates. Candidates can also get scholarships based on their class 12 percentage or CUET percentile.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna highest package?
Ans. The Amity University Patna highest package reported in 2024 placements is INR 30 LPA, while the average package is INR 5 LPA. Some of its top recruiters include ITC Ltd, Colgate Palmolive, Nestle, Reliance Jio, IndusInd Bank, GE Transportation, Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, Asian Paints, Justdial, Berger Paints, Airtel, Marico, Zomato, Indigo and many more.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna MBA fee?
Ans. The Amity University Patna MBA fee is INR 1,66,500 for non-sponsored candidates and INR 1,94,000 for sponsored candidates. Whereas, the MBA International fee is INR 2,50,000 for non-sponsored candidates and INR 2,91,000 for sponsored candidates.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna fee structure for BTech?
Ans. The Amity University Patna BTech fee structure ranges between INR 65,000 to 95,000 for non-sponsored candidates and between INR 97,500 to INR 1,47,500 for sponsored candidates.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna contact no?
Ans. Students wanting to get admission to Amity University Patna courses can contact the institute on +91-73-600-30061/2/3/4/5/6, or Toll Free No : 18001026090, or WhatsApp No.: 7360030066, or Email: admissions@ptn.amity.edu.
Ques. How to get Amity University Patna BBA admission?
Ans. Amity University Patna admission process for BBA is based on a Personal Interview, a question on English Language Skill, and a Subject Specific Question. To be eligibile for Amity University Patna BBA admissions, candidates must have passed in 10+2 with at least 50% aggregate marks. However, candidates can also get direct admission if they have passed in 10+2 with at least 80% aggregate marks.
Ques. What is the Amity University Patna hostel fees?
Ans. The Amity University Patna hostel fees is INR 1,68,000 per annum for a single AC room and INR 90,000 for a single non-AC room.
Ques. Is Patna Amity University good?
Ans. Yes, Patna Amity is a good university in terms of education and scholarships offered. Since the university is located in a central location, it is also well connected by railways and roadways. Students can also reach the institute via taxis or autorickshaws or even personal transport vehicles.
